name: Detect.js
author: Darcy Clarke
license: Dual licensed under the MIT and GPL licenses.
description: JS Library to detect browser, os and device based on the UserAgent String

scripts.start: node build/build.js --input build/detect.js --output detect.js --package package.json && node build/build.js --input build/detect.js --output detect.min.js --minify --package package.json && node scripts/update_readme_version.js README.md
